      • getId

        public String getId()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns ID of this task. Must be unique across all tasks ever created.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Task
        Returns:
        task ID

      • getGroupId

        public String getGroupId()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns group ID of this task. Tasks with the same group ID can share locks. If tasks do not need to share locks, a common convention is to set group ID equal to task ID.
        Specified by:
        getGroupId in interface Task
        Returns:
        task group ID

      • getTaskResource

        public TaskResource getTaskResource()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns a TaskResource for this task. Task resources define specific worker requirements a task may require.
        Specified by:
        getTaskResource in interface Task
        Returns:
        TaskResource for this task

      • getNodeType

        public String getNodeType()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Get the nodeType for if/when this task publishes on zookeeper.
        Specified by:
        getNodeType in interface Task
        Returns:
        the nodeType to use when publishing the server to zookeeper. null if the task doesn't expect to publish to zookeeper.

      • getDataSource

        public String getDataSource()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns the datasource this task operates on. Each task can operate on only one datasource.
        Specified by:
        getDataSource in interface Task

      • getQueryRunner

        public <T> QueryRunner<T> getQueryRunner(Query<T> query)
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns query runners for this task. If this task is not meant to answer queries over its datasource, this method should return null.
        Specified by:
        getQueryRunner in interface Task
        Type Parameters:
        T - query result type
        Returns:
        query runners for this task

      • getClasspathPrefix

        public String getClasspathPrefix()
        Description copied from interface: Task
        Returns an extra classpath that should be prepended to the default classpath when running this task. If no extra classpath should be prepended, this should return null or the empty string.
        Specified by:
        getClasspathPrefix in interface Task
